From our farm to your table

Welcome to Kehler Vegetable Company At Kehler Vegetable Company, we're more than just a farm. We're a place where fresh flavors, sustainable practices, and community spirit come together. Nestled on 20 lush acres in the heart of the Comox Valley, we proudly grow a vibrant variety of vegetables, juicy berries, and gather farm-fresh eggs from our happy, pasture-raised hens. Our mission is simple: to bring you the most nutritious, locally-grown produce while caring for the land and fostering a connection between our farm and our community.

Whether you're stopping by for a handful of fresh-picked greens or a carton of eggs, you're not just a customer,you're part of the Kehler family.

Why choose Kehler Vegetables

At Kehler Vegetable Company, we believe in the power of fresh, flavorful food grown with care. Every bite of our produce bursts with nutrients, thanks to our thoughtful harvesting practices that ensure farm-fresh quality, always. Sustainability is at the heart of everything we doâ€”our organic growing methods and natural soil enrichment reflect our commitment to farming in harmony with nature. Most importantly, we're more than a farm; we're part of the local community. By choosing us, you're not only nourishing your family with wholesome food but also supporting a shared vision of health, connection, and sustainability.

How it works?

Step 1

Find Us at the Farm Gate

Our cozy farmstand is located right at the entrance of our 20-acre farm. It's stocked with fresh vegetables, berries, and eggs straight from our fields to your table.

Step 2

Bring Your Shopping Bag

Our farmstand is self-serve and runs on the honor system. Simply pick what you need and pay at the stand. A little change is available if needed.

Step 3

Shop During Seasonal Hours

We're open seasonally:
Wednesday to Friday: 10 AM - 5 PM
Saturday: 9 AM - Noon
